title: How to Make Quick and Easy Apricot Ice Cream

steps.headline: Fold the puréed apricots through the whipped cream.
Place in a tray.
steps.description: Smooth out if wished but peaks are fine too.

steps.headline: Place in the freezer.
steps.description: Freeze for an hour or until hardened.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Scoop out as usual. Quick, easy, tasty! Serve with some apricot halves if wished.

text: Whip the cream.  Purée the apricots.  Fold the puréed apricots through the whipped cream.  Place in a tray. Smooth out if wished but peaks are fine too. Place in the freezer. Freeze for an hour or until hardened. Serve. Scoop out as usual. Quick, easy, tasty! Serve with some apricot halves if wished. Finished.
